verses.name: Matthew 10:33
verses.text: But whosoever shall deny me before men, him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 10:34
verses.text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword.

verses.name: Matthew 10:35
verses.text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.

verses.name: Matthew 10:36
verses.text: And a man’s foes shall be they of his own household.
